As $STAKEHOLDER

I want $FEATURE / We need $XYZ

Because $REASON

NOTES:
- Note 1
- Note 2

BLOCKERS:
- [ ] #123
- [ ] #456

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Criteria 1
- [ ] Criteria 2
- [ ] The code is fully tested or a good explanation given why it should not or cannot be tested
